result.purpose: Responsible for defining the EVM client interface and data models for interacting with Moralis API endpoints and handling blockchain tokens.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating client interactions and data models related to the Moralis API.

internal/infras/moralis/client.go.purpose: Defines the EVM client interface and configuration for interacting with Moralis API endpoints.

internal/infras/moralis/models.go.purpose: Defines data models for handling fungible and NFT tokens in a blockchain context.
